languages.text: "Я понимаю, сколь недостойной выгляжу в твоих глазах. И пусть это прозвучит нелепым оправданием, но я... не желала предавать тебя, {name}. Я лишь желала узнать правду о гибели Крудараха, обрести свой народ. И когда увидела осколок своего мира в твоей обители, тот самый трофей, что покоится на стене, меня обуяли гнев и страх. И когда темный кузен сладко нашептал мне на ухо, что знает ответы на все вопросы... я ошиблась. Я доверилась сородичу. И, боясь, что ты откажешь мне, узнав, откуда я получила указания, попросила тебя лишь направить корабль в указанную систему".

"I understand how unworthy I am in your eyes. This may sound like a ridiculous excuse, but... I did not want to betray you, {name}. I only wished to learn the truth about Crudarach's demise and find my kin. And when I saw the shard of my world in your dwelling, that trophy mounted on the wall, I was beside myself with fear and rage. And when my dark cousin whispered in my ear that he knew the answers to my questions... I made a mistake. I trusted my kin. And, fearing that you might refuse me if you knew where I had been getting my orders from, I simply asked you to direct your ship to the particular system."
languages.original_text: "Я понимаю, сколь недостойной выгляжу в твоих глазах. И пусть это прозвучит нелепым оправданием, но я... не желала предавать тебя, {name}. Я лишь желала узнать правду о гибели Крудараха, обрести свой народ. И когда увидела осколок своего мира в твоей обители, тот самый трофей, что покоится на стене, меня обуяли гнев и страх. И когда темный кузен сладко нашептал мне на ухо, что знает ответы на все вопросы... я ошиблась. Я доверилась сородичу. И, боясь, что ты откажешь мне, узнав, откуда я получила указания, попросила тебя лишь направить корабль в указанную систему".

traits.locale_text: "I understand how unworthy I am in your eyes. This may sound as a ridiculous excuse, but... I did not want to betray you, {name}. I only wished to learn the truth about Crudarach's demise, find my kinsmen. And when I had laid my eyes upon the shard of my world in your dwelling, the very trophy that is mounted on the wall, I was beside myself with fear and rage. And after my dark cousin had whispered into my ear that he knows the answers to my questions... I made a mistake. I trusted my kinsman. And, fearing that you may turn me down after learning where I'd been getting my orders from, I simply asked you to direct your ship into the particular system."

And, fearing that you may turn me down after learning where I'd been getting my orders from, I simply asked you to direct your ship into the particular system."

languages.text: “我知道，我在你眼里一文不值。这话听起来像蹩脚的借口，但……但我真的无意背叛你，{name}。我只想找出克鲁达拉赫陨落的真相，找到我的族人。我在你的房间里看到了我的世界的碎片，我看到它被挂在墙上，当成了战利品。那个时候，我感到害怕，也感到愤怒。我的黑暗灵族表亲在我的耳畔低语，说他知道那些问题的答案，我听信了他的谗言……就此铸下大错。我当时很害怕，担心如果你知道我是从哪里得到的这些信息，你一定会拒绝我。因此，我只是要求你将飞船驶向某个特定的星系。”
languages.original_text: "I understand how unworthy I am in your eyes. This may sound like a ridiculous excuse, but... I did not want to betray you, {name}. I only wished to learn the truth about Crudarach's demise and find my kin. And when I saw the shard of my world in your dwelling, that trophy mounted on the wall, I was beside myself with fear and rage. And when my dark cousin whispered in my ear that he knew the answers to my questions... I made a mistake. I trusted my kin. And, fearing that you might refuse me if you knew where I had been getting my orders from, I simply asked you to direct your ship to the particular system."

traits.locale_text: “我知道，我在你眼里一文不值。这话听起来像蹩脚的借口，但……但我真的无意背叛你，{name}。我只想找出克鲁达拉赫陨落的真相，找到我的族人。我在你的房间里看到了我的世界的碎片，我看到它被挂在墙上，当成了战利品。那个时候，我感到害怕，也感到愤怒。我的黑暗灵族表亲在我的耳畔低语，说他知道那些问题的答案，我听信了他的谗言……就此铸下大错。我当时很害怕，担心如果你知道我是从哪里得到的这些信息，你一定会拒绝我。因此，我只是要求你将飞船驶向某个特定的星系。”

languages.text: «Entiendo lo indigna que soy a tus ojos. Quizá te parezca una excusa ridícula, pero... yo no deseaba traicionarte, {name}. Solo quería averiguar la verdad sobre la destrucción de Crudarach y encontrar a mi gente. Y cuando vi el fragmento de mi mundo astronave en tus aposentos, expuesto en la pared como un vulgar trofeo, me pudieron el miedo y la ira. Y cuando mi oscuro pariente me susurró al oído que conocía la respuesta a mis preguntas... cometí un error. Confié en mi especie. Y temiendo que te negaras si sabías de dónde procedían mis órdenes, me limité a pedirte que dirigieras tu nave hacia ese sistema en particular».
languages.original_text: "I understand how unworthy I am in your eyes. This may sound like a ridiculous excuse, but... I did not want to betray you, {name}. I only wished to learn the truth about Crudarach's demise and find my kin. And when I saw the shard of my world in your dwelling, that trophy mounted on the wall, I was beside myself with fear and rage. And when my dark cousin whispered in my ear that he knew the answers to my questions... I made a mistake. I trusted my kin. And, fearing that you might refuse me if you knew where I had been getting my orders from, I simply asked you to direct your ship to the particular system."

traits.locale_text: «Entiendo lo indigna que soy a tus ojos. Quizá te parezca una excusa ridícula, pero... yo no deseaba traicionarte, {name}. Solo quería averiguar la verdad sobre la destrucción de Crudarach y encontrar a mi gente. Y cuando vi el fragmento de mi mundo astronave en tus aposentos, expuesto en la pared como un vulgar trofeo, me pudieron el miedo y la ira. Y cuando mi oscuro pariente me susurró al oído que conocía la respuesta a mis preguntas... cometí un error. Confié en mi especie. Y temiendo que te negaras si sabías de dónde procedían mis órdenes, me limité a pedirte que dirigieras tu nave hacia ese sistema en particular».

languages.text: « Je comprends parfaitement que vous ayez une piètre estime de moi. Mon excuse vous semblera peut-être ridicule, mais... je n'avais pas l'intention de vous trahir, {name}. Je voulais simplement découvrir la vérité sur la disparition de Crudarach et retrouver les miens. Quand j'ai vu le fragment de mon monde dans vos quartiers, réduit à un vulgaire trophée sur un mur, j'ai été aveuglée par la colère et la peur. Et quand mon ténébreux cousin m'a susurré à l'oreille qu'il savait où trouver les réponses à mes questions... j'ai commis une erreur. J'ai fait confiance à l'un de mes semblables. Comme j'avais peur que vous refusiez d'accéder à ma demande en découvrant ma source d'information, je vous ai simplement demandé de mettre le cap sur un système bien précis. »
languages.original_text: "I understand how unworthy I am in your eyes. This may sound like a ridiculous excuse, but... I did not want to betray you, {name}. I only wished to learn the truth about Crudarach's demise and find my kin. And when I saw the shard of my world in your dwelling, that trophy mounted on the wall, I was beside myself with fear and rage. And when my dark cousin whispered in my ear that he knew the answers to my questions... I made a mistake. I trusted my kin. And, fearing that you might refuse me if you knew where I had been getting my orders from, I simply asked you to direct your ship to the particular system."

traits.locale_text: « Je comprends parfaitement que vous ayez une piètre estime de moi. Mon excuse vous semblera peut-être ridicule, mais... je n'avais pas l'intention de vous trahir, {name}. Je voulais simplement découvrir la vérité sur la disparition de Crudarach et retrouver les miens. Quand j'ai vu le fragment de mon monde dans vos quartiers, réduit à un vulgaire trophée sur un mur, j'ai été aveuglée par la colère et la peur. Et quand mon ténébreux cousin m'a susurré à l'oreille qu'il savait où trouver les réponses à mes questions... j'ai commis une erreur. J'ai fait confiance à l'un de mes semblables. Comme j'avais peur que vous refusiez d'accéder à ma demande en découvrant ma source d'information, je vous ai simplement demandé de mettre le cap sur un système bien précis. »

languages.text: "Ich verstehe, wie unwürdig ich in Euren Augen bin. Das klingt vielleicht wie eine lächerliche Ausrede, aber ... ich wollte Euch nicht verraten, {name}. Ich wollte nur die Wahrheit über den Niedergang von Crudarach erfahren und meine Leute finden. Und als ich den Splitter meiner Welt in Eurer Wohnstatt sah, diese Trophäe an der Wand, da stand ich vor Angst und Zorn völlig neben mir. Und als mein dunkler Vetter in mein Ohr flüsterte, dass er die Antworten auf meine Fragen kennt ... Ich habe einen Fehler begangen. Ich habe den Meinen vertraut. Und aus Angst, Ihr würdet ablehnen, wenn Ihr wüsstet, woher ich meine Befehle empfange, habe ich Euch einfach darum gebeten, Kurs auf das fragliche System zu setzen."
languages.original_text: "I understand how unworthy I am in your eyes. This may sound like a ridiculous excuse, but... I did not want to betray you, {name}. And, fearing that you might refuse me if you knew where I had been getting my orders from, I simply asked you to direct your ship to the particular system."

Und aus Angst, Ihr würdet ablehnen, wenn Ihr wüsstet, woher ich meine Befehle empfange, habe ich Euch einfach darum gebeten, Kurs auf das fragliche System zu setzen."

languages.text: 「あなたの目には、私がどれほど無価値に映っているか、理解している。バカげた言い訳に聞こえるかもしれないが…あなたを裏切りたくなかったのだ、{name}。クルダラの死について真実を知り、キンを見つけたかっただけだ。そしてあなたの住居で私の世界の欠片を見たとき、壁に取り付けられた戦利品を見たとき、私は恐怖と怒りで我を忘れていた。そして闇の従兄弟が私の耳元で質問の答えを知っていると囁いた時…私は過ちを犯してしまった。キンを信頼していた。そして、私が誰の命令を受けていたかをあなたに知られれば、あなたが拒むかもしれないと恐れ、ただ、あなたの船をある星系に向けるよう求めたんだ」
languages.original_text: "I understand how unworthy I am in your eyes. This may sound like a ridiculous excuse, but... I did not want to betray you, {name}. I only wished to learn the truth about Crudarach's demise and find my kin. And when I saw the shard of my world in your dwelling, that trophy mounted on the wall, I was beside myself with fear and rage. And when my dark cousin whispered in my ear that he knew the answers to my questions... I made a mistake. I trusted my kin. And, fearing that you might refuse me if you knew where I had been getting my orders from, I simply asked you to direct your ship to the particular system."

languages.text: "Gözünde ne kadar değersiz olduğumu anlıyorum. Saçma bir bahane gibi gelebilir ama... Sana ihanet etmek istemedim {name}. Sadece Crudarach'ın sonunu getiren gerçeği öğrenmek ve soydaşlarımı bulmak istedim. Senin odanda kendi dünyamdan bir parça, duvarda asılı duran o ganimeti görünce korku ve öfkeden kendimi kaybettim. Bir de kara soydaşım kulağıma sorularımın cevaplarını bildiğini fısıldayınca... Bir hata yaptım, soydaşlarıma güvendim. Nereden emir aldığımı öğrenirsen beni uzaklaştırabileceğinden korktuğum için gemini o sisteme yönlendirmeni istedim."
languages.original_text: "I understand how unworthy I am in your eyes. This may sound like a ridiculous excuse, but... I did not want to betray you, {name}. I only wished to learn the truth about Crudarach's demise and find my kin. And when my dark cousin whispered in my ear that he knew the answers to my questions... I made a mistake. I trusted my kin. And, fearing that you might refuse me if you knew where I had been getting my orders from, I simply asked you to direct your ship to the particular system."

traits.locale_text: "Gözünde ne kadar değersiz olduğumu anlıyorum. Saçma bir bahane gibi gelebilir ama... Sana ihanet etmek istemedim {name}. Sadece Crudarach'ın sonunu getiren gerçeği öğrenmek ve soydaşlarımı bulmak istedim. Senin odanda kendi dünyamdan bir parça, duvarda asılı duran o ganimeti görünce korku ve öfkeden kendimi kaybettim. Bir de karanlık kuzenim kulağıma sorularımın cevaplarını bildiğini fısıldayınca... Bir hata yaptım, soydaşlarıma güvendim. Nereden emir aldığımı öğrenirsen beni uzaklaştırabileceğinden korktuğum için gemini o sisteme yönlendirmeni istedim."
